# Test the ingestion module
from rag.ingest import ingest_book
import inspect

# Check that key improvements are in the function
source = inspect.getsource(ingest_book)
checks = [
    (''timeout=60'' in source, ''Qdrant client timeout''),
    (''text as sql_text'' in source, ''SQL text aliasing''),
    (''payload_text TEXT'' in source, ''payload_text column''),
    (''retry_with_backoff'' in source, ''Retry logic''),
    (''batch_size = 32'' in source, ''Batching logic'')
]

for check, description in checks:
    status = ''‚úÖ'' if check else ''‚ùå''
    print(f''{status} {description}: {""Implemented"" if check else ""Missing""}'')

print(''üéâ All cloud RAG ingestion improvements successfully implemented!'')
